api_list.name: initConfig v3
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://partyline.p.rapidapi.com/publicApi/v3/initConfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "partyline.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check get env
api_list.description:
When you send all API requests, you need to include the env cookie; otherwise, it will default to calling the prod1 environment.

This API will give you correct env cookie for Partyline and Commentator

tagKey and tagValue is PL env cookie
commentatorTagKey and commentatorTagValue is commentator env cookie

The next API call final cookie should be like:
```
SID=47A70A8606984F4597053F3F1CCED980; commentator3=ct3;partylinet3=plt3;
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://partyline.p.rapidapi.com/party/noLogin/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "partyline.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
